p: The 53BP1-mCherry-RAD54L-mVenus cells were treated with 100 nM CPT for 1 h to verify RAD54L-mVenus as a biosensor of HR. The result showed that RAD51 foci overlapped with RAD54L, indicating sites of HR, and the number of overlapping RAD51 and RAD54L foci was > 90% ( Figure 4d). These showed that our HR and NHEJ biosensors performed similarly in terms of localization and quantitation to endogenous proteins after DNA damage.
